TEXT.TITLE: ISRAELI JETS RAID SOUTH LEBANON
TEXT.BODY: Israeli jets bombed Palestinian targets in south Lebanon for the second time in four days, Lebanese security sources said. They said the planes attacked targets in the Darb al-Sim area a few kms east of Sidon. Israeli planes carried out a similar raid in the same area on Friday, hitting two buildings used by guerrillas loyal to Palestinian leader Yasser Arafat. REUTER
